mapper.select: select rbsm.*, v.rate_value, v.trade_dt from (select t.security_super_type, t.term_to_maturity_string, t.security_dec, case when t.security_super_type = 'IRS' then t.security_id else concat(t.security_id, '.IB') end as security_id, t.symbol from smds.rdi_bond_security_master t) rbsm left join (select c.rate_value, c.trade_dt, c.security_id from VW_CURRENCYVALUATION c where c.trade_dt = (select max(f.trade_dt) from VW_CURRENCYVALUATION f) v on v.security_id = rbsm.security_id ) v on v.security_id = rbsm.security_id
